data.name: Clipptic
data.detailed_description:
Capture screenshots. Record GIFs. Upload files. Onto your own domain name via secured FTP. Share instantly.

Clipptic is the quickest and nicest FTP client for Windows.

It's a great tool for every designer and anyone who needs to share images, GIFs or files fast. It's a matter of two clicks and a few seconds to get a link to content you want to share.

You already pay for your web hosting. Why not to use it as a cloud for sharing your files? It's your server – your rules – your files.

Your uploads are packed into a nicely looking HTML templates for easy viewing and downloading. And you can customize the templates with your own logo.

Links to your uploads easily integrate in many popular collaborative services, e.g. Slack.

data.short_description: Capture screenshots. Record GIFs. Upload files. On your own server via FTP. Share instantly. Clipptic is the quickest and nicest FTP client for Windows. Select an area of your screen or select a file – it gets automatically uploaded to FTP server – you get a URL in your clipboard that you can share.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8+
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
